channel.title: Update on WHISTLER SAI
channel.description: Recent content in Update on WHISTLER SAI

item.title: Systemware Monthly Progress Report
item.description: Header The time: 3:27 PM Eastern Time The place: Systemware Internal Product Testing Lab 3 The writer: Jay Isles Summary This is the first of a monthly internal progress report used for tracking the movements of the sapient AI, Whistler. During the course of the month, Whistler has not moved in much, if any, capacity. The only occurance to have happened within the month is a single update to its so-called “pet project”, Dreamsearch.
